name: A Seed's Tale
description:
Long Term GameJamOn: All systems working, this demo shows some implementation. This build is about taking the first mission note and finding the object related with that note. Apart from that, feel free to explore and see what you 

A Seed's Tale is a 3D adventure game in which you explore an island between the mortal and divine world, set in the Greek mythological world where you become Antheia, a demigoddess and born from Gaia's nature-energy filled seed and Persephone as her mother. You will have to gather favors from other Olympic gods in order to switch seasons at will.

Keyboard Controls:

- Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys

- Interact: F key

- Jump: Space

- Glide: Hold Space while in air

Mote to come...!

Controller Controls (Almost finished)

Note: Text boxes can only be continued with mouse at the moment.
